en.title: Enter these details from the letter
en.instructions: Enter the reference number and security access code from the letter the court sent you.
en.referenceNumberOrPinDoNotMatch: The Case ID and/or PIN was not recognised. Please re-enter. If the situation persists, please contact the court

errors.referenceNumberRequired: Enter the 16-digit case ID to continue
errors.referenceNumberDigitsOnly: The case id is 16 digits and can only contain the numbers 1 to 9
errors.securityAccessCodeRequired: Enter the security access code to continue
errors.securityAccessCodeDigitsOnly: The PIN number cannot contain special characters
